name: tgptopon
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: sylib(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(c0, ctps))
stmt.pretty: sylib(c0 ∈ TopGrp, c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2), c0 ∈ TopSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctgp), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopGrp → c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
